com.schibsted.account.introspection

Class TokenValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.schibsted.account.introspection.TokenValidator

  • public class TokenValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    TokenValidator validates a token, using a list of introspection methods (ordered by priority).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TokenValidator(java.util.List<TokenIntrospector> introspectors)
      Constructor.

      Validate a token, verifying it has the correct audience and contains all required scopes.

    • Method Detail

      • validateAccessToken

        public IntrospectionResult validateAccessToken(java.lang.String token,
                                               java.lang.String expectedIssuer,
                                               java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> requiredScopes,
                                               java.lang.String requiredAudience)
        Validate a token, verifying it has the correct audience and contains all required scopes. The token will be introspected with the configured introspection methods first, which validates token expiration, etc., before being validated against any additional audience and scope restrictions.
        Parameters:
        token - token to validate
        expectedIssuer - expected issuer identifier
        requiredScopes - all required scopes, or null
        requiredAudience - expected identifier for the token audience, or null
        Returns:
        the authorization data of the token
        Throws:
        InvalidTokenException - if the token did not fulfill all requirements: invalid signature, missing required scope, missing required audience
